spec_data.Name: cjdns-tools
spec_data.License: GPLv3 and MIT and BSD and ISC
spec_data.Description:
Nodejs tools for cjdns. Highlights:
peerStats          show current peer status
cjdnslog           display cjdroute log
cjdns-traceroute   trace route to cjdns IP
sessionStats       show current crypto sessions
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 24 May 2017 07:32:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
